What's resource

I thinks this image explain it very well: https://dev4devs.files.wordpress.com/2019/10/kupa_0104.png.

The image is somebody's work, so thank them.

Basically, resource is similar to class, When you programing, don't write a big chunk of code in single clourse, resource seperate them into individual yaml file so its complexity is under controlled.

Common type of resource

  • Pod A set of running container(that is guaranteed to be on same physical machine)

    Generally, you don't write Pod yaml file, it's generated by ReplicatSet.

  • Deployment A blueprint for construction of Pod

  • ReplicatSet A Plan to decide how many Pod should be created from some blueprint

  • Service Defined what port and what proto(tcp/udp/grpc) on what Pod(or no pod if unavailable)

Selector and metadata

In the diagram, it's obvious that some connection is made between Service and Pod, that's what we called selector.

In Service yaml, we need to defined such thing

selector:
   key-abc: efg

In Pod yaml, there is...

metadata:
    key-abc: efg

It should matched, so k8s is able to find your Pod open some port.
